item.title: Adima Changala
item.description: Adima Changala is a 1981 Indian Malayalam action-adventure film, directed by A. B. Raj and produced by R. S. Sreenivasan. The film stars Prem Nazir, Sheela, Swapna and Vishnuvardhan in the lead roles. The film has musical score by M. K. Arjunan. It is a remake of the 1969 Italian zapata spaghetti western film The Five Man Army. The train sequence in the movie is an excellently shot scene, especially for the '80s.
